name: Post Human Tales Airdrop by Zigor

metadata.name: Tipula #1/46
metadata.description:
It likes humid and shady environments. It is a voracious predator with an innocent and friendly appearance
capable of illuminating any place with its smile, an ability it uses to attract its future victims. It is a creature as
desirable as it is dangerous for its powers to fight the darkness of the Post Human Tales universe.
